name: ShirtPromoter
0:
”Alexa, open shirt promoter”
”Alexa, ask shirt promoter is Amazon offering developer shirts”
”Alexa, ask shirt promoter is Amazon offering developer Shirts”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: shirt promoter
des: Amazon frequently offers free developer T-shirts in exchange for a developer completing a certain task. This app will tell you if Amazon currently has one of these offers going on at that moment
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
